front.title: IEEE Draft Application Guide for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers > 1000 Vac Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This guide covers the application of indoor and outdoor high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 V for use in commercial, industrial, and utility installations. It deals with usage under varied service conditions, temperature conditions affecting continuous current compensation, reduced dielectrics, reclosing derating as applicable, calculation of system short5 circuit current, compensation at different X/R ratios, detailed calculations with application curves, out-of-phase switching, and general application
